text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends He never said that. Ever. 

And what's breaking our Healthcare system is the huge surge in Covid19 cases, which is  happening due to your stupidity & incompetent handling of the pandemic response. 125,000 AMERICANS ARE DEAD BECAUSE OF YOU. RESIGN.
